title: Perimeter DVDRip - Myth (2004)
description:
A revolution in real time strategy, Perimeter arrives on this planet loaded with innovative ideas that are nothing less than groundbreaking for the RTS genre. Strategic Transforming, Impenetrable Perimeter Force Shields and Nano-Technology put Perimeter at the forefront of RTS gaming, giving the player an amazing new universe to explore and endless possibilities of play.

     Perimeter launches the player into a vast science fiction universe with an epic storyline spanning time, civilization and space. As a player you are a member of the Exodus civilization. You have abandoned a dying Earth in search of a new home. Now your fate relies on your ability to colonize and conquer!
